title: What champs aren't tank/support and need little CS?
body:
I have a friend who tends to steal too much CS when I lane with him in duo top or a non-meta duo lane, when he wants just a bit of gold for an item (Even more hilarious is the fact he sometimes AAs in a way that leads to neither of us gaining CS). So I started getting him to play {{champion:7}} , which can go without CS and still carry because she scales off champion kills and assists rather than farm due to her lack of waveclear. Now we're both really effective at non-meta duo lanes, but LeBlanc is getting a bit boring for him.


What champs like {{champion:7}} can carry with little CS and usually do so with more ease than other champs? Of course, she needs a BIT, but the first kill should get her in a spree. I'm not looking for supports like Soraka who need 0 CS.

replies.body:
If you're running jungle, then you don't generally have to worry too much about people taking your cs, nor would you need all that much to function properly thanks to jungle buffs and items.

Or if you have to lane you can try play the snowball killing machines like Olaf or Rengar who farm champs instead of minions, but they are the type who don't always come out successful so there's that too.

But really, generally only supp and tanks can still function quite well when they don't even cs much due to the utility they provide.

> But really, generally only supp and tanks can still function quite well when they don't even cs much due to the utility they provide.

Olaf and Rengar are exactly what I mean; snowballing with champs and having the ability to do so without taking too much CS for a long amount of time. Unfortunately I can't find any ranged or AP ones {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} other than LB. Maybe I can just tell him to start off with Relic Shield instead.

"because she scales off champion kills and assists rather than farm". This sentence make no sense. Kills give you gold, farm gives you gold. The only champions that scale off of kills better than from farming are those who gain extra bonus's from kills (Rengar). If you want someone who doesnt need gold to carry a game, you need someone with either a strong early game(lee sin), or someone with a lot of cc(most supports, some junglers, some toplaners(sion)).

A LeBlanc's power is better measured in her kills than assists, CS or lack of deaths. She drops off really badly at midgame if she doesn't get 1 kill before 20 mins.

I'll tell him to take Lee Sin, but doesn't Sion need CS like Nasus except for HP?
tell him to play j4, he is great in duo lanes
